verbs.description: [ARG0: arizona man] [V: built] [ARG1: dozens of pipe bombs] [ARGM-CAU: because wife feared government collapse] officials said a dps task force found 42 pipe bombs in jeffrey metcalf home with enough raw materials to make at least 30 more jeffrey metcalf bombs
